### April 25, 2025

**RobinCar2 R Package Released on CRAN**

The [RobinCar2](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RobinCar2/index.html) R package (ROBust INference for Covariate Adjustment in Randomized Clinical Trials) made its debut on CRAN. It is a lighter version of the [RobinCar](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RobinCar/index.html) R package, focusing on generalized linear models. Low dependency and extensive validations make it useful for GxP purposes. More information about RobinCar2 including vignettes could be found at  [Openpharma | RobinCar2](https://openpharma.github.io/RobinCar2/main/).
